channel.title: Comments on: Will Sanders Migrates South for the Winter
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: Will
item.description:
The 80s action flick had a guy with a mullet who had an uzi. I think that says everything. I don't know what they were saying and it didn't matter. It was a cheap VCD and skipped a lot but made for great diner entertainment. It was almost as cool as movie night.
Sorry it took me forever to check the comments this time.
item.content:encoded:
The 80s action flick had a guy with a mullet who had an uzi. I think that says everything. I don’t know what they were saying and it didn’t matter. It was a cheap VCD and skipped a lot but made for great diner entertainment. It was almost as cool as movie night.

Sorry it took me forever to check the comments this time.

item.title: by: Matthew Swann
item.description: Kick ass blog. Glad you got rebelious. BTW, how was the 80's action flick?
item.content:encoded: Kick ass blog. Glad you got rebelious. BTW, how was the 80’s action flick?

item.title: by: Ryan T. Burke
item.description: Ditto to everything Amy said, as always. I'm really proud of you Will and I miss you man. Just finished reading this blog and now I think I'll drink and listen to "Don't know what you got till it's gone" by Cinderella on a nonstop loop for an hour.
item.content:encoded: Ditto to everything Amy said, as always. I’m really proud of you Will and I miss you man. Just finished reading this blog and now I think I’ll drink and listen to “Don’t know what you got till it’s gone” by Cinderella on a nonstop loop for an hour.

item.title: by: Amy Bugg
item.description:
I feel like I have been waiting forever for this. I just wish we could have been there with you to celebrate with fireworks and sandcake....what an adventure you are having! Can't wait to hear the rest!
Miss you tons, and love you more! =)
item.content:encoded:
I feel like I have been waiting forever for this. I just wish we could have been there with you to celebrate with fireworks and sandcake….what an adventure you are having! Can’t wait to hear the rest!

Miss you tons, and love you more! =)

item.title: by: marcus
item.description:
I think I am going to hell because I laughed at that poor crab for almost a half hour waking up Mary Beth and scaring the cat. Will I can visualize you doing all this. Thank your for taking the time to post this stuff. It really makes my day for night. I will be anticipateing parts IV and V and maybe then you can do a recap prequel I, II, and III.
Oh yeah. They bagged a Colossal squid of the coast of Antarctica 38 ft, and we were graced with a total lunar eclipse here on the East coast last Saturday.
Keep em coming!
item.content:encoded:
I think I am going to hell because I laughed at that poor crab for almost a half hour waking up Mary Beth and scaring the cat. Will I can visualize you doing all this. Thank your for taking the time to post this stuff. It really makes my day for night. I will be anticipateing parts IV and V and maybe then you can do a recap prequel I, II, and III.

Oh yeah. They bagged a Colossal squid of the coast of Antarctica 38 ft, and we were graced with a total lunar eclipse here on the East coast last Saturday.

Keep em coming!
